system.description:
Through self-mastery and mystical learning, you have drunk deep of the well of nature’s might and can transform yourself into a fearsome avatar of the untamed world. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you begin a long rest and are outdoors in an area with good soil such as a forest, swamp, plains, prairie, or farmland, you can extend small roots into the ground and draw your nourishment from the soil, eliminating the need for Supply this rest.
  • Once per turn when you hit with an unarmed strike, natural weapon from a wild shaped form, lashing fine from the Plantlike Characteristics option of the Branch and Claw feat, or weapon enchanted with shillelagh, you can spend a spell slot to deal a number of d6s equal to the level of the spell slot expended of additional damage to the target. You can choose to have this damage be acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, or poison damage. Once you have used this benefit a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
  • The denizens of nature recognize and respect you. Your prestige rank is treated as 1 higher by creatures of the beast, elemental, fey, monstrosity, and plant types, and also with any creature that knows the Druidic language. Even if they are hostile to you, they will generally be more receptive to your attempts to come to a non-violent resolution. You gain an expertise die to Persuasion checks with the indicated creature types and it increases by 1 step for attempts to de-escalate a conflict.
  • You and friendly creatures of the beast, elemental, fey, monstrosity, and plant types, and also with any creature that knows the Druidic language within 30 feet of you have an expertise die on saves to disbelieve illusions, death saves, and saving throws against fear.
  • You can spend 2 uses of Wild Shape to receive the traits of animalistic and plantlike characteristics at the same time. If you do, you also become the scourge of the unnatural. You have advantage on attacks against creatures of the Aberration type for the duration.
